polito.sdp2017.Components

Class FPGAConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • polito.sdp2017.Components.FPGAConfiguration

  • public class FPGAConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes all possible features and functionalities that a configuration, to be loaded into the FPGA of the SEcube board, should have. One FPGAConfiguration is characterized by an unique id, a name, the list of all IPcores (it's possible that two equal cores are mapped more than once), the IPmanager, a bitstream (ABSOLUTE)path, a set of hardware properties, one contact point (an author) and a path for additional driver source.

      • setNumberIPCoresInConstantsVHDL

        public static boolean setNumberIPCoresInConstantsVHDL(FPGAConfiguration fpgaconf)
        This method rewrites the content of the VHDL package constants.vhd, in according to the specified template, every time createConfiguration() is invoked. It is a necessary step before running the synthesis.
        Parameters:
        fpgaconf -
        Returns:
        true if everything ended well, otherwise false

      • createTCLScript

        public static boolean createTCLScript(FPGAConfiguration fpgaconf)
        This method generates dynamically the synthesis tcl script, in according to a template, listing all components to be added to the project. The script is generated inside the Lattice Diamond file system.
        Parameters:
        fpgaconf -
        Returns:
        true if everything ended well, otherwise false

      • runSynthesis

        public static boolean runSynthesis(FPGAConfiguration fpgaconf)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        This method creates the process that performs the synthesis. That process invokes the Diamond TCL shell to which to call the synthesis script, generated in the previous step. After that, if the bit stream exits, it is copied in the right folder and all reports are generated.
        Parameters:
        fpgaconf - : The configuration to be synthesized.
        Returns:
        true if everything ended well, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • copyBitstream

        public static void copyBitstream(FPGAConfiguration fpgaconf)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method is invoked internally runSynthesis. It performs the copy of the bit stream from the Lattic folders to the workspace one.
        Parameters:
        fpgaconf - : the configuration to be synthesized
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getHPFromLattice

        public static HardwareProperties getHPFromLattice(java.lang.String pathDir)
        This method looks for all hardware information in some reports in Diamond folders, on the configuration just synthesized.
        Parameters:
        pathDir - : It's the absolute path referred to the folder ntXX in Diamond folders.
        Returns:
        All the hardware properties as an unique object.

      • deleteAllFiles

        public static void deleteAllFiles(java.lang.String path)
        Deletes all files in the specified folder. If there are sub folders, their content is erased in a recursive way.
        Parameters:
        path: - The path of the target folder.

      • createConfiguration

        public static void createConfiguration(FPGAConfiguration fpgaconf,
                                       DBManager DBM)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is the core of the configuration creation. Seven steps are performed. 1 - Constans.vhd is dynamically generated taking into account the number of the IPCores for the current configuration 2 - TopLevelEntity.vhd is dynamically generated taking into account the IPManager, all the selected IPCores and their priorities 3 - The TCL script for the synthesis is dynamically generated taking into account the hdlSourcePaths 4 - Runs the synthesis and save the bit stream 5 - Looks for all hardware properties 6 - Cancels all files generated running the synthesis 7 - The new configuration is inserted into the database.
        Parameters:
        fpgaconf - : configuration to be synthesized
        DBM - : database manager object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
